file_content.text: Im--possible! Lord Rathari... will still be you and your master's... downfall....
Your master will be as dead as you soon enough.
Rathari dies next. [Kill]
Yaaaa...!
Oh hoho. You were clearly the stronger. Great sport, great action.
Grow up.
Y--yes. That is... exactly what I intend... to do....
You fought well. Let me bind your wounds.
I'll save you.
N--no! I will not accept... such... a disgrace!
I die by... my own hand... not... yours...!
Oh-hoh-hoh-hoh! Great sport for us! Rathari's Sith self-destructed! Oh-hoh-hoh-hoh!
Defeating Girik is one thing, Sith. Lord Rathari will be another. We've never seen a more vicious animal.
The animal is about to be put down.
I'll handle it.
Your petulance is most amusing. And the idea of not having to deal with Rathari is invigorating.
Just give me the chance, that's all I ask.
Bear with me.
You've earned at least that. We would not be upset if we didn't have to deal with Rathari anymore.
I believe you owe me my winnings.
Pay up.
Well-earned. Care to double it against Lord Rathari?
Let it ride. I'll come to collect after I've dealt with Rathari.
You're on.
You're on, Sith. Now, either way, I win--I recoup my losses or we are rid of the pain of dealing with Rathari.
Dispatching Rathari will be its own reward.
Not necessary.
I didn't come here to play games. This betting is frivolous.
I'm bored with wagers.
Take your winnings. Small price to pay if you are able to get rid of Rathari.
Pray I don't decide to come back and kill you, too.
Your doubt angers me.
Your demeanor is off-putting, but we will ignore it for the chance that we no longer have to deal with Rathari.
Trust that we will not agree to Lord Rathari's terms unless you fail. We will be watching for word of the results. Goodbye.
You would be wise to bend to the great Lord Rathari's will. Sign over the specified territories before he loses his patience.
Your master is a hard man, Girik. It's not easy to trap a Hutt, let alone the entire Cartel. It seems we have no other choice.
I am your other choice.
You want an alternative?
Big mistake.
I knew Hutts were spineless, but who knew they were gutless too?
Cowards.
This is a closed session. Who are you?
I'll tell you who this is. This is the apprentice of an over-the-hill Sith named Darth Baras.
Yes, that's right, my master and I anticipated your arrival.
Where is your master, worm?
I seek Rathari.
I am Lord Rathari's proxy in dealing with the Cartel. And I will be his sword arm dealing with you.
You have me at a disadvantage.
Who are you?
I am Girik, apprentice to Lord Rathari and... the death of you.
Have you also anticipated your doom?
Then you're prepared to die?
Oh hoho. It seems another Sith suitor appears. Tell us your purpose, dark one.
I have no quarrel with you. But Rathari must die.
Just to kill Lord Rathari.
By bursting in here, you create a quarrel with us. You disregard the alliance between the Hutt Cartel and the Empire.
Your master should be the one to contact us, and not in this rude manner. Now you risk our wrath as well as Girik's.
I'm here to make sure the Cartel doesn't become Rathari's pawn.
This treaty must be stopped.
There are proper channels to seek our audience, Sith.
Shut up, or I'll kill you and your men along with Rathari's toady.
Do you want to die?
Bursting in here to take on Lord Rathari is foolish enough.
You stack the odds further against yourself by angering us. Not very smart.
I urge you to stand aside and watch me dispatch this pretender.
Indulge me.
It would be intriguing if you can back that bravado up.
I seek to relieve the Cartel of the burden of Rathari's intrusions.
I'm here to help you.
If you're stupid enough to stand against me, then you will die today.
I'm warning you.
We do not look kindly on threats, Sith.
We have seen Rathari's strength firsthand. We know nothing of yours.
Fight Girik; let us see who is superior. If you survive, we will consider delaying our treaty with Rathari.
What odds will you give me on the intruder, Ybann?
Two to one. I'll take all bets that Girik survives the day.
What are the odds you Hutts survive my attack?
Everyone dies, Hutts included.
You would kill us as well? Just defeat Rathari's apprentice, and you'll earn our agreement.
The intruder cannot be reasoned with. Our bodyguards will cover you, Girik. Together, we will kill this braggart twice.
Our alliance begins with the death of Baras's slave. Attack!
I'll take you up on that. You pay when Rathari's boy dies at my hands.
Easy money..
Done. If the intruder loses, I loot the corpse.
Fine, I'll unburden us of this intruder--but then you'd better sign on the dotted line.
This will not take much more of your time, Hutts.
I'll make it quick
This is a joke! [Attack all]
The intruder means to attack!
Our bodyguards will cover you, Girik.
You're lucky we're allies.
Battle lines are drawn, Sith. Girik will not stop until one of you is dead.
Yes, a most glorious spectacle. I expect I'll be very entertained--and richer, when you die, Sith.
This is madness.
The intruder is very serious, Ybann. I think I'll be taking your credits.
Then the bet is doubled.
Very well.
Excellent. When you lose, I get to loot your corpse.
We'll see about that.
Ha! I like this one, Ybann. I think I'll be taking your credits.
Enjoy the show.
